HI THERE, I'M AUNIK

About Me

I'm a junior at the University at Buffalo pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science. I love solving problems and enjoy challenges that require innovation and creativity. I have a passion for programming and am particularly fascinated with machine learning. Currently, I'm working as a remote intern for a start-up called Kryptonite and am actively looking for internships for the upcoming spring and summer.

My interests outside of programming lie in music and gaming. Whenever I'm not learning something new or honing my problem-solving skills, I usually practice my guitar, listen to music or grind out some rank matches on League of Legends.

PROJECTS

CryptoBot
Github
A bot that trades Etheruem on Coinbase Pro. The trading logic is set on moving averages. Tested the bot on historical data and made profits on paper money. Wrote the bot in Python and used the Coinbase Pro API to make all the requests. Future plans for the project include the integration of more trading algorithms, support for more currencies and testing on real money.
Portfolio
Github
A responsive static website that serves as my online portfolio. Used HTML5 and CSS3 to build it. Future plans include keeping the portfolio updated and adding new features to the website.
Codenames
Github
A board game written in Java. This was a semester-long project where we had to work in teams to build the game from scratch. Learned iterative software cycles, object-oriented programming and version control. Responsibilities included writing the test cases and parts of the game mechanics.
